channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lcqsyw.png[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to the CodeX development team thread. I would like to start off by saying that CodeX will be a economy server. I will be making the website and, My main goal is to make this a player friendly server. __________________________________________________________________________ [shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Info About The Server:[/size][/shadow] -Skilling area -Great Home -All skills trainable -Economy -All godwars bosses -Combat training teleports -Skillcape emotes -Spirit Shields -Clan Chat Working -PvP Armours, Chaotics (All) -Torva etc... -Loyalte Titles -Nomad and many more! _______________________________________________________________________ [shadow=black,left][size=14pt]About Us:[/size][/shadow] We need coders,Hoster and much more! apply today. __________________________________________________________________________ [shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Official Members:[/size][/shadow] Owner: ALPHA (Me) Co-Owner: Dillon Developer: N/A Developer: N/A GFX: ALPHA (Me) GFX: N/A __________________________________________________________________________
[shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Server staff:[/size][/shadow] Owner: ALPHA (Me) Co-Owner: Dillon Admins: skippy, Tyler, Maby 1 more Mods: 2 mods needed donators: need donators __________________________________________________________________________
[shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Media:[/size][/shadow]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20hm2rs.png[/img]

__________________________________________________________________________ [shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Application:[/size][/shadow] Name: Age: MSN/SKYPE: What Postion: Experience: Example(if u have) (If Picked Hoster) how long can you host a day? [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Taren Taren
item.description:
@Taren wrote:

i guess this servers down… but just in case
Name:Taren
Age:16
MSN/SKYPE:sp00ki@hotmail.com
What Postion:host
Experience:i’ve been hosting my own servers since 2008 and i’ve been looking for a server to host recently because I have the perfect PC for standalone hosting of a server. it will only host and that’s it. (it is a different pc then the one i am using, but it’s right next to me and it just sits there.)
Example(if u have)
(If Picked Hoster) how long can you host a day? 24hours 7days a week. i currently sit at home 24/7 and use my computer. this one is a different pc that i don’t use but it just sits next to me so it is perfect for the job at hand.

[center]Welcome to the CodeX development team thread. I would like to start off by saying that CodeX will be a economy server. I will be making the website and, My main goal is to make this a player friendly server.

[shadow=black,left][size=14pt]Info About The Server:[/size][/shadow]
-Skilling area
-Great Home
-All skills trainable
-Economy
-All godwars bosses
-Combat training teleports
-Skillcape emotes
-Spirit Shields
-Clan Chat Working
-PvP Armours, Chaotics (All)
-Torva etc…
-Loyalte Titles
-Nomad
and many more!

[shadow=black,left][size=14pt]About Us:[/size][/shadow]
We need coders,Hoster and much more! apply today.
